example.name: all args
example.text: John Wetherell, a Lloyd's underwriter, says he and his fellow underwriters underestimated by as much as 50% the premiums they should have charged for property risks from 1980 to 1985.
example.arg: the premiums they should have charged for property risks from 1980 to 1985

example.name: missing extent
example.text: I had underestimated, however, both Mr. Gelbart's wit and the persistence of scandal in Washington.
example.arg: both Mr. Gelbart's wit and the persistence of scandal in Washington

example.name: missing agent
example.text: In other words, [the growth rates of both total GNP and real private business product per labor hour]-1 have been underestimated [*-1] by about 20%.

example.name: missing agent and EXT
example.text: But while verbal high jinks alone won't help PASOK regain power, [Mr. Papandreou]-1 should never be underestimated [*-1].

predicate.note: Frames file for 'underestimate' based on sentences in wsj.
